name: Ar'alani's aunt
content:
A Chiss female was a member of the Chiss Ascendancy's ruling Irizi family and the aunt of Admiral Ar'alani of the Chiss Expansionary Defense Fleet. She enjoyed sewing projects while Ar'alani—known as Irizi'ar'alani "Ziara" in her youth—was growing up. By 19 BBY, then-Commodore Ar'alani and Senior Commander Mitth'raw'nuruodo "Thrawn" were invited to the Garwian Unity capital planet of Solitair. After viewing the extensive craftsmanship of the Garwian people there, Ar'alani mentioned that her aunt enjoyed sewing projects, though they were not as elaborate as the Garwian crafts.
Ar'alani's aunt was mentioned in the flashbacks of the 2020 novel Thrawn Ascendancy: Chaos Rising, the first installment of Timothy Zahn's Star Wars: The Ascendancy Trilogy.
